org.springframework.kafka.config

类 AbstractKafkaListenerContainerFactory<C extends AbstractMessageListenerContainer<K,V>,K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.kafka.config.AbstractKafkaListenerContainerFactory<C,K,V>
  • 类型参数:
    C - the AbstractMessageListenerContainer implementation type.
    K - the key type.
    V - the value type.
    所有已实现的接口:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationEventPublisherAware, KafkaListenerContainerFactory<C>
    直接已知子类:
    ConcurrentKafkaListenerContainerFactory

    public abstract class AbstractKafkaListenerContainerFactory<C extends AbstractMessageListenerContainer<K,V>,K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements KafkaListenerContainerFactory<C>, org.springframework.context.ApplicationEventPublisherAware
    Base KafkaListenerContainerFactory for Spring's base container implementation.
    另请参阅:
    AbstractMessageListenerContainer
